subject: Computers and the Internet
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Three Miami men who helped promote the online gambling firm BetOnSports have pleaded guilty to federal charges. William Hernan Lenis, his son Will Lenis, and his nephew Manny Lenis entered the pleas Wednesday in St. Louis. Lawyers for the men said they were minor players caught up in a high-profile investigation.
